page.title: 03RECREATION part 1
page.content: We play games in the playground, in the streets, gardens and parks. 'Ball He' is popular. A ball is needed, 'He' throws the ball at someone and if it hits anyone they become 'He'. Another game is 'Gladiator'. One person is the gladiator, one person is his prisoner, The object is to 'kill' the enemy. You can use a cricket bat, badmington racket, tennis balls or tennis rackets. You must touch your enemy twice to kill him. If a prisoner kills a gladiator he turns into the gladiator himself. '40_40' is also played, it is similar to 'Hide and seak'. Someone closes her eyes and the others hide. If she turns round and sees anyone she shouts out '40_40 I see Fred behind the dustbins', and then Fred is it.
